caption.p: NTDs distribution in Mozambique per province. a, provincial map for each specific NTD identified per province during 2008–2018 in Mozambique, b, number of NTDs identified per province during 2008–2018 in Mozambique. These maps are original, build with R ( http://www.R-project.org/). Cartographic resources were obtained from GADM ( www.gadm.org), epidemiological data was obtained from the manuscripts reviewed. See Additional file 5. NTDs: Neglected tropical diseases. *Only national data but not provincial data is provided
